name: Sweet Snatcher
description:
You've broken in to a mansion to get some candy. Find the 4 bowls of candy and escape without getting caught. 

Controls: WASD- Move

                      Shift- Run      

                      Ctrl- Crouch    

                      Left Click- Grab/Interact

This was made for the Sokpop Spookjam. I'm planning on re submitting this game in a few days with animations and sound I just wanted to submit something for the jam. This was my first project ever and I know its pretty bad but this was a learning experience
